issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: Accessing JobCouner page in HistoryServer, display all the task info.Clicking on "Launched map tasks" display Map Task and Reduce Task.
fields.summary: Counters page display all task neverthless of task type( Map or Reduce)

comments.body: Attached screenshot for counters page. In screen shot, it can be observe that TOTAL_LAUNCHED_MAPS has reducer task id.
